title: Anyone else kinda wish that someone survives an encounter with a champion?
body: I understand that these stories and videos are supposed to show how powerful and badass the champions are in comparison to everyone else, but having these champions just faceroll over all opposition is getting kinda boring.

replies.body:
Champions are world-class at what they do. It'd be unrealistic if they got away with whatever.

That said, Caitlyn only caught ONE of the warmasons.

Oh, right, forgot about that guy.

Welp my thread is now useless.
